jobDescription: Job Title: Analyst  Location: Franklin Lakes, NJ  Contract Term: 7+ Months  Weekly 40.00 Hours [Mon - Fri] Description:Responsibilities:Drive and execute projects including but not limited to quality investigation, continuous improvement, manufacturing efficiency, quality improvement, test method development and validation.Execute activities in investigating and trouble-shooting technical issues and customer complaints.Participate in supplier assessments for raw material selection and conduct/coordinate test on raw materials in order to ensure quality.Conduct background literature research; design and execute test plan; perform statistical analysis; and communicate technical results and recommendations to project team member and supervisor.Establish and maintain project documentation that meets FDA regulatory requirements, including design control procedures.Qualifications:B.S. in a Science or Bioengineering discipline.Solid knowledge and experience of material and biological test method development and testing.Excellent communication skills (both oral and written)Self-motivated with a strong sense of urgency and willing to take hands on work
